name: MSA Safety Incorporated
description: MSA Safety Incorporated is a global leader in the development, manufacture, and supply of safety products that protect people and facility infrastructures. Founded in 1914 and headquartered in Cranberry Township, Pennsylvania, MSA is renowned for its innovative technology and commitment to safety across various industries, including industrial, fire service, military, and construction. The company's product range includes personal protective equipment (PPE) such as helmets, respiratory protection, gas detection devices, and fall protection systems. MSA's solutions are designed to enhance safety and improve operational efficiency, meeting stringent safety standards and regulations worldwide. A pioneer in the field, MSA continually invests in research and development to advance safety technology, ensuring that workers are protected in hazardous environments. The company's mission is to provide customers with high-quality, reliable safety products that help save lives and enhance workplace safety. MSA operates through a global network of subsidiaries and distributors, providing local support and expertise to customers around the world. With a strong focus on sustainability and corporate responsibility, MSA is committed to reducing its environmental impact while promoting safety and health in the workplace.
ceo: Nicolet J. B. O. van der Molen

key_executives.name: Nicolet J. B. O. van der Molen
